description.en:
A full-fledged Western action film drawn by the author of the classic period drama "Akadou Suzunosuke''!
The adventures of the boy gunfighter Sabu begin in the smoke-filled American West!
[Synopsis]
Sabu, a young boy whose parents were killed by a thug with a mustache,
goes on a journey to avenge his death and find his real mother! What awaits Sabu wherever he goes on his journey...?

[Commentary] "Hirabaruji Sub'', which began serialization in Shonen Gahosha's "Shonen Gaho'' in 1961,
is a western drama by Tsunayoshi Takeuchi. This is one of the works that was serialized around the time
when he was active in many magazines as a popular manga artist after the blockbuster success of "Akado Suzunosuke''
(at the same time, he also wrote "Shonen Jet'' and "Condor King''). It is serialized).

Western movies such as "Rawhide'' and "Laramie Ranch'' were big hits in Japan at the time, and
manga were also accepted as a popular genre among young boys. Also, in this work, you will definitely feel the taste of an old period drama as
the main character Sabu meets various people and grows as he continues his journey to take revenge ! Complete story recording. This is the first time it has been published in book form. We hope you enjoy this classic Western drama that is typical of boys' manga.
